pkgmetadata.longdescription: Water Cloud Model (WCM) for the Simulation of Leaf Area Index (LAI) and Soil Moisture (SM) from Microwave Backscattering // Retrieval the leaf area index (LAI) and soil moisture (SM) from microwave backscattering data using water cloud model (WCM) model . The WCM algorithm attributed to Pervot et al.(1993) doi:10.1016/0034-4257(93)90053-Z. The authors are grateful to SAC, ISRO, Ahmedabad for providing financial support to Dr. Prashant K Srivastava to conduct this research work.
